caption.p: The RVF virus tripartite RNA genome structure. S-segment encodes for nucleoprotein (N) and a non-structural protein ( NSs) that determine the virus virulence. M-segment encodes two envelope glycoproteins, Gn and Gc, and two uncharacterized polypeptides (NSm1, and NSm2). L-segment encodes L protein (viral polymerase).
